game_description: 1. Basic Operation: - You can start the battle by firing the main guns of the battleship. - The following modern weapons are added to increase the tension of the game: - Your battleship has CIWS Beam for defense - Enemy battleship has Anti-ship missiles 2. The Physical Law Modification: To realize the short-time and amazing spectacle battle of huge battleships, some of the physical laws in this Real-Time Simulation World are carefully modified. 3. Conclusion: We believe that the amazing spectacle battle of the huge battleship in VR world is established by the unique modification of the physical laws in this application. Please enjoy this VR real-time simulation of battle of battleship. Null City Realtime Simulation, Development Team
review_1: I've only really given 2 stars for the idea / topic, unfortunately not very good / slightly lunatic. Just wanted to get some idea of scale and atmosphere, which would be helped by a few things: remove the modern weapons, unrealistic scale, missiles, lasers; provide realistic ship viewpoint(s) - as in one you'd actually have such as bridge - without the daft sliding.
review_2: I recently stream this from my YouTube channel and was surprised by how much I liked this game. Sound effects are good and you get a feeling for what it must've felt like during WWII when you see your ship rocked from a huge explosion , I hope the devs have plans to add more ships even if it's paid dlc , assuming ships have strengths and weaknesses makes the game all the more strategic , at $3 it's definitely worth a look if you're into battleships
